title: 1999/319/CFSP: Council Decision of 10 May 1999 implementing Common Position 1999/318/CFSP concerning additional restrictive measures against the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 10 May 1999
implementing Common Position 1999/318/CFSP concerning additional restrictive measures against the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia
(1999/319/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Common Position 1999/318/CFSP(1), adopted by the Council on 10 May 1999 concerning additional restrictive measures against the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia (FRY),
Whereas in order to implement Article 1(1) and (2) of Common Position 1999/318/CFSP an implementing Decision by the Council is needed,
main_body:
The persons to which the obligation of non-admission referred to in Article 1 of Common Position 1999/318/CFSP applies are the following:
>TABLE>
This Decision shall take effect on the same date as Common Position 1999/318/CFSP.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 May 1999.
For the Council
The President
H. EICHEL
(1) See page 1 of this Official Journal.
